reviews.review: this game is amazing, i loved this game since i was 5. most of my library is just mods of portal like blue portals and prelude

Well that was quick.
Not sure how i finished it so quick I didn't use any help or The Youtube all i did was alone with my experience.
But overall it was a joy of game.
Really fun game, also is hard at some parts which makes it worth the money

I fought big robot lady and got 1 hour of sleep
10/10

muy buen juego, para ser un experimento de valve, lo a conseguido muy bien, puzzles que poco a poco son mas complejos, pero no tanto como para estar atascado mucho tiempo. una forma diferente a como resolver puzzles en plataformero.
para ser su primera entrega, la cantidad de horas en completar el juego es suficiente, (de 4 a 5 horas si es tu primera vez).

Truly, one of the most fun, funny and challenging games I have ever played. I've been feeling so burnt out with the current state of gaming and I thought that I'd give Portal a chance. I bought the bundle and beat both games in under ten hours. I am completely satisfied and astounded that a developer can have this much passion for game development and translate it into the gameplay experience. 10/10, going to play Half-Life now.

So good you don't need to describe it.

Its Portal...
Should is ay more?
Really fun puzzle game with a little story telling

fuckin amazing
graphics are insanely impressive for 2007 and 100% worth buying in 2022, the story has soo much lore

The first game in the Portal series, great game, challenging and interesting. It is a valve game so it is really good work. I recommend playing this game and all the other Portal games (mods and Portal2).
Intriguing game that will make your brain hurt but will be worth it for the story, would also recommend you to buy the second part of Portal
portal is great if you dont buy i will kill you!
Honestly, together with its sequel, my favorite game of all time.

very good very niceeeee very good very niceeee
I'm completely stupid but hey the game's cool.
An all-time classic masterpiece! A must play for folks who love puzzle games. This is an excellent game to develop spatial intelligence or at least become more aware of it.
A quasi-dangerous mind stretching experience. Teaches relationships between values and results in an animated and non-personal threatening environment. Good for eye to hand coordination also.
The graphics and play style aged very well in this game.
its literally portal, if you know anything about gaming you know portal.
Amazing experience. The game to learn clean game design.
Simplemente una joya que no envejece.
This game is great! Everyone already knows this however. Short, sweet, and easy for even children of younger ages. Highly recommend.
It's a classic there's not much more to say.
It's Portal, an icon of gaming. +lore if your into that.
mas corto que mi verga pero es un lindo jueguito si estas aburrido y no sabes que jugar
Exactly what I expected for a game created in 2007, incredible for it's time, one of the best game series to be ever created for sure.
Really good game, only thing that could be better in my opinion is that it can be a bit jittery when you go in and out of the portals

The physics and puzzles in this game are an absolute joy to complete. The game is short but for the price definitely worth it. One of my favourite games of all time with a perfect mix of fast paced portal shooting mid air and puzzle solving.
I love this game. Played through about 10+ times. Right now im trying to 100% the game. when im done with that i will most likely have 120+ hour on the game.
